great network of great people and the app is pretty good however there are a few features i would love to see 1 autosaved drafts for messages its infuriating to lose everything youve typed because you went back to look again at the map or someones profile 2 add a location search bar to the map view so i can zoom to a city and then browse people on the map 3 overlay a gpx file so i can see how far off my planned route a host might be 4 switch to something like a custom mapbox vector map optimized for cycling   
 (0.89)
